alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:43PM EDT until July 28 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN AROOSTOOK COUNTY... At 443 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smyrna, or 10 miles west of Houlton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Houlton, Hodgdon, Smyrna, Amity, Cary Plantation, Smyrna Mills, Dudley Township, Littleton, Linneus, Oakfield, New Limerick, Ludlow, Cary and North Amity. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 287 and 304. US Highway 1 between North Amity and Houlton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
